name: freesurfer_stats_and_qc
description: FreeSurfer aseg/aparc stats (and QC metrics) extractor

inputs.name: script_path
inputs.description: Path to the script to run.

inputs.name: input_dir_path
inputs.description: Path to the input directory. Can be either a single FreeSurfer subjects directories (if "--mode single" is used) or a directory containing multiple FreeSurfer directories (if "--mode multi" is used).

inputs.name: output_stats_file_path
inputs.description: Path to the output TSV file.

inputs.name: mode
inputs.description: Whether to process a single FreeSurfer subjects directory or multiple directories (default: single).

inputs.name: container
inputs.description: Container command and arguments (including image file), as a single string. This needs to contain everything needed to be able to run the FreeSurfer commands, for example "apptainer exec --bind <INPUT_DIR_PATH> <IMAGE_FILE_PATH>". Does not need to be specified if running on a system with FreeSurfer installed. IMPORTANT: only the Singularity/Apptainer container engine is explicitly supported because it allows for forwarding environment variables; this script might work with Docker containers but likely only with --mode single.

inputs.name: aseg_args
inputs.description: Optional arguments to pass to asegstats2table, as a single string.

inputs.name: aparc_args
inputs.description: Optional arguments to pass to aparcstats2table, as a single string.

inputs.name: output_qc_file_path
inputs.description: Optional path to the output TSV file for QC metrics. If this is not provided, only the stats file will be generated.

inputs.name: euler_surf_paths
inputs.description: Paths to the surface files to calculate the Euler number from (default: ['surf/lh.white', 'surf/rh.white', 'surf/lh.pial', 'surf/rh.pial']).

inputs.name: cnr_vol_paths
inputs.description: Paths to the volume files to calculate the contrast-to-noise ratio from (default: ['mri/norm.mgz']).

inputs.name: cnr_measures
inputs.description: Names of the CNR measures to include in the QC metrics file for each volume (default: ['gray_white_cnr', 'gray_csf_cnr']).

inputs.name: sub_colname
inputs.description: Column name to use for the subject ID in the final output file (default: "participant_id").

inputs.name: ses_colname
inputs.description: Column name to use for the session ID in the final output file (default: "session_id").

inputs.name: sub_prefix
inputs.description: Prefix to strip from the subject IDs in the final output file (default: "sub-"). Set as empty string to keep the original values.

inputs.name: ses_prefix
inputs.description: Prefix to strip from the session IDs in the final output file (default: "ses-"). Set as empty string to keep the original values.
